Phòng sạch, tiện nghi đầy đủ, ăn sáng ok
Pleasant property and great staff
Great place to stay , extraordinary service, great breakfast buffet, lovely settu
Hotel à recommander à can tho. Très belle infrastructure, bien cnçue et bien située.

Très agréable cet hôtel, très bien placé à proximité de tout mais dans le calme. 2 piscines, un spa extérieur efficace avec des professionnels compétents. Les chambres spacieuses et confortables et une literie correcte. En quelques minutes à pied on arrive à l effervescence de can tho ( surtout le week-end). Petit déjeuner très généreux et de bon qualité. Le personnel est sympathique mais ils peuvent être un peu plus réactif pour aider pour le transport et pour les conseils pratiques! ça reste une bonne adresse.

2 jours d excellences dans cet établissement de 1ère classe. Tout était parfait, emplacement, restaurant, services, accueil, chambre. Nous avons passé un mois en vietnam et cet hôtel de ville était notre préféré parmi tous les 4 et 5 étoiles.

This was one of many visits made to the victoria can tho resort. Each time visiting this hotel the staff is quite welcoming, can remember your name making you feel like a very special guest. The entire staff there was polite and friendly.
Perfect in every way

깨끗하고, 친절한 휴양 호텔. 젊고, 노시는 것 좋아하는 분들은 여기말고, 시내에 방 잡으시길 바랍니다. 택시비가 저렴해도 매번 식사 때마다 나가려니 가랑비에 옷 젖는다고, 꽤 나오더라구요. 한 5일 묶었는데, 푹 쉬다 갑니다. 레스토랑이 가성비가 떨어지긴 하지만, 로컬에서 어설프게 먹는 것보단 훨씬 메리트 있습니다. 주변에서 몇 번 먹고, 배달해서 먹어보곤, 레스토랑에서 먹게 되었습니다. 아이가 수영 좋아하고, 푹 쉬길 좋아하시는 분들. 강추합니다. 직원분들 너무 친절하세요. 특히 레스토랑부의 안경쓴 dung씨. 항상 웃고, 반갑게 맞이해주고 친절하게 대해주셔서 감사합니다. 덕분에 휴가 기간이 더 즐겁게 느껴졌습니다. 다음에 또 껀터에 가게 된다면, 꼭 다시 방문하겠습니다 안녕히
R

The hotel looks like an old french colonial building with beautiful wood and tiles. The rooms have balconies and are super well appointed. It has two pools, it is a 10 minute walk from downtown and the breakfast buffet is amazing. Thu at the bar and duong at the restaurant were super accommodating. If you decide to go to can tho, this is an excellent choice.

Hotel de style colonial, le site est très propre. Le déjeuner est excellent. Un peu trop formel a l arrivée et au départ, du genre, on ne peut pas aller nous-même au front desk, on doit attendre dans les fauteuils à l entrée. La piscine est grande et propre.

This was our second visit to this hotel in 2 years and we truly in joy the location along the river. The staff are all amazing and quite pleasant. They have (2) huge swimming pools and a great buffet breakfast. What more do you need? a boat trip on the river, yes they will arrange one for you as well. This resort is a must should you come visit the area. 100 worth the money.
Fantastic hotel, lovely staff, great location
Exceed my expectations
Such a beautiful place to stay. Kids loved the massive pools.
Es war ein kurzer (eine nacht) aber sehr schöner aufenthalt. Alles inkl. Des frühstücks war prima.

Victoria resort is a sprawling older colonial-style mekong luxury resort hotel. During my march 24-26 stay, it was not crowded, felt very relaxing had lovely views of the mekong by its 2 large outdoor pools. Staff are eager-to-please guests, well-trained and spoke fluent english. Breakfast buffet was scrumptious, with a vast spread of high-quality, delicious foods drinks. Only drawback i felt, is that the rooms toilets are fairly small and do not have natural lighting. Though the toilets have thoughtfully-installed safety features like grab-bars, tower rails. The room is otherwise very comfortable and well-appointed. The balconies are large and airy.

Guter ausgangspunkt für den besuch der schwimmenden märkte. (2 märkte besucht mit nur geringer anzahl an booten 5 uhr morgens). Nach aufenthalt in ländlichen eco lodges schöne abwechslung durch ein hotel im kolonialstil mit allen annehmlichkeiten.
Very average and not to recommend.
Idyllic surroundings in the mekong. The river is just next door. The service is so polite and efficient.
Sehr schönes hotel am mekong. Ruhig gelegen, trotzdem in gehdistanz zum zentrum. Gerne wiedeer. Einziger kritikpunkt das wlan ist leider etwas instabil.
Excellent hotel, great service, just a beautiful hotel in can tho
L hôtel est tout simplement magnifique, les piscines sont très belles et grandes ! nous avons adoré cet hotel

L hotel victoria est un excellent hotel bien situé avec un personnel acceuillant et chaleureux. Il mérite ses cinq étoiles avec cependant un petit bémol pour le pdj qui est correct mais sans plus. Les prix des chambres semblent avoir évolué à la hausse aussi. Cela dit, il s agit du meilleur hébergement à can tho selon moi et je le recommande.
Älskar detta hotell. Världens mysigaste, familjärt och mysig stämning. Bra massage! wi-fi och frukost kan förbättras.roligt att se att de byggt ut poolområdet.
It is juat fantastic.
Excellent. Rapport qualité/prix,repas un peu coûteux ,mais excellents.tres bonne situation.les excursions ne valent pas la peines,et sont trop chères.
Nhân viên thân thiện, chuyên nghiệp,tuy nhiên nhà hàng cần bổ sung thêm nhiều món ăn việt nam vào thực đơn nữa
Good hotel with good breakfast and staff. The room was a bit lower than expected

Great location a few min walk from the city centre and the wharf. The hotel staff is very friendly and attentive, the pool area is lovely and room was clean, bed comfy. The building is a bit dated and the aircon quite noisy, but overall we had a good experience and would go back if staying in can tho again
Bel hôtel, avec belle grande piscine. Situé à un endroit tranquille et en bordure des rives du mékong (et tout près du centre-ville). Les employés sont toujours très aidants.
Nice and good hotel with professional staffs. Good food, nice swimming pool, nice and big room,
It isn t 4 star hotel but it looks 5star in terma of service.

Absolument superbe, dépaysement garantie, confort, luxe, sobriété. Le cadre est magnifique au bord de la rivière, le centre ville accessible à pied en 10 mn par une jolie promenade le long de la rivière, 2 superbes piscines, petit déjeuner parfait, les repas sont également excellent et les prix plus que raisonnable. Nous avons également fait l excursion au marché flottant avec le bateau de l hotel , parfait et au même tarif qu en ville, n hésitez pas. Accueil excellent on recommande pour un merveilleux souvenir du vietnam !
Séjour très agréable dans un hotel très classe et dans un cadre magnifique. On en redemande!

As in the many other past visits i ve made to victoria resort in can tho, vn., we were as always, extremely impressed and pleased. The employees are so welcoming and friendly from the receptionist to the bellhops making your visit even more memorable. There s many other great hotel resort choices in can tho, vn, but if you re looking for a reasonable, budgeted top notch , clean, quiet, comfortable and relaxing resort for a weekend or longer, then victoria resort is a place not to miss! without a doubt this is one, if not the only one resort in south east asia out of hundreds, yes i said, hundreds that i ve stayed at that provides you the best bang for your buck . Oh don t forget to take an evening walk on the newly upgraded river walk way and then an evening swim in one of two pools.
The quiet atmosphere at the resort is wonderful
The hotel is clean and well built. The staff very friendly and helpful. The food was great with good selection. Will come again.
Hôtel très agréable pour se ressourcer notamment au bord des 2 belles piscines. Bien situé avec un accès piétonnier facile au centre can tho. Restauration très bonne et personnel attentionné.
Great food and service

C est à peine magnifique de style colonial si tu es très proche du centre-ville par une passerelle ou des navettes qui portent de l hôtel la chambre est magnifique la piscine splendide le service et le staff irréprochable un endroit idyllique

A unique little paradise. The look and feel of the hotel is amazing. We felt at home relaxed straight away. The staff is incredibly friendly, professional and helpful. Special shoutout to the host who speaks many languages (also dutch) and remembers the names of the guests. We thoroughly enjoyed it!
Second séjour de trois nuits à quelques jours d intervalle. Hôtel parfait dans les deux cas

Hôtel de charme avec un personnel exceptionnel si bien que le service est parfait discret, efficace et personnalisé. Chambre, piscines, espaces communs et parc irréprochables et parfaitement entretenus
Lovely hotel, helpful staff,

This is our second time coming back here, two weeks ago we were here and fell in love with the environment and the services over here, the last review was a mistake from expedia. I didn t mean to post that review. Everything is perfect here. I love the the layout of the pool,the room everything is so clean. The staff are so friendly and very helpful highly recommend!!
Perfect location, many small bars , restaurants ten minutes walk , hotel is very charming, confortable , calm . Friendly staff
L hôtel est vraiment parfait dans un style colonial impeccable mais relativement éloigné de la ville prêt de vélo très appréciable
This was yet another wonderful stay with pleasant memories and staff workers. Very welcoming and hospitable.
All staffs were kind. So cozy. Very nice resort to relax.
Lovely hotel. Beautiful grounds. Peaceful and relaxing. Staff was fantastic.
Resort hotel offering a calm relaxing environment, large swimming pool and good restaurant. Staff friendly and helpful.

Everything was very well provided. The staff was very welcoming and friendly. The place was very comfortable and beautiful. I have stayed at many hotels around the world and tend to pay a lot of attention to the details of the rooms and the hotel. This hotel deserves a top score, for how it is managed, prices and relative to the locality and condition.

Wonderful hotel located in an oasis of greenery just on the edge of town. Fabulous facility with excellent service and staff. It seems very british with just the right touches of vietnam. May be on the expensive side for some but we got a terrific price through expedia! i would highly recommend to anyone. Thanks expedia.
Hôtel avec une situation idéal reposant, personnel attentif, petit bémol service un peu long au niveau du restaurant
High end resort with two beautiful pools and spacious rooms, really amazing place.
Établissement propre et personnel chaleureux et accueillant.
Walk to the town along the waterfront is beautiful.
Very clean, very helpful staff, wonderful pool. I really enjoyed listening to the piano by the pool in the afternoon

It s a very old hotel that needs refurbishment. The room was noisy at night as it was opposite the bar and super annoying. The mattress was hard and wasn t comfy. Limited variety for breakfast and the food wasn t tasty. Ok to stay for a night but not more than that.
The staff was superb, and the hotel and grounds very well taken care of. Highly recommend the thai massage.
Bien situé, jolies piscines, chambres spacieuses et confortables, accueil sympathique
Kaunis resort ihanalla piha-alueella ja kivoilla altailla. Hyvä aamupala. Huone hieman tunkkainen ja vahva homeenhaju huoneessa. Palvelu ystävällistä.

Sehr schön gelegenes resort im kolonialstil. Wir haben dort weihnachten mit einer super arrangierten party am pool verbracht. Das personal ist extrem freundlich und das hotel hat einen sehr speziellen, eigenen charme wie alle victoria hotels
Great hotel! one of my favorite hotels in vietnam. Staff is great, lots of things to do, great food and service.

Très bien sauf proposition de visite du marché flottant à un prix pharaonique ! (déclinée evidemment). Vingt fois ce que nous avons payé pour un bateau privatif! excellent petit déjeuner. Service sympathique et efficace.

Le service à l hôtel victoria s est révélé excellent de notre arrivée jusqu à notre départ. Disponible et élégant, le staff s est montré à la hauteur de nos attentes, tant en terme de prévenance que de gentillesse. La ville de can tho n a pas grand intérêt mais l hôtel se charge de rendre votre séjour inoubliable. Les chambres sont propres, spacieuses et calmes, leur propreté sans faille, le petit déjeuner parfait, les deux piscines incroyables .

We stayed at their suite, 216, which gas a lovely view of the hotel s lush garden. The room was elegantly decorated. We particularly liked the bathroom, which has a walk in shower. Room maids were efficient and courteous. The hotel lobby was open plan with a nice breeze. Very relaxing to sit there with a drink. The hotel has two pools surrounded by palm trees and tropical plants. The hotel s grounds were well maintained. We also enjoyed the breakfast. The chef would cook pho (vietnamese noodle soup) and deliver to our table. There were plenty of choices for different tastes. We had two tours organised by the hotel. Both tour guides were very knowledgeable and spoke good english. Both tours gave us an opportunity to know local people s daily life. The icing on the cake of our stay was the staff. Efficient service always with a smile. We would like to thank all including coung, son, trung, k anh, the nurse the chef at breakfast, our room maids and the two masseurs.
Tout était parfait
Underbart hotell! fint, rent, trevligt område, bra pooler, riktigt bra frukost och mycket trevlig och hjälpsam personal. Rekommenderas varmt.
Everything was very good at this hotell except the massage. The victoria package suposed to be neck, head, thai massage etc but was just an ordinary massage

Had a great four night break in this relaxing resort over the lunar new year holiday period. A pleasant stroll of a few hundred metres along the river front gets you to the town. We used the hotel bicycles to visit the town (traffic was quiet due to the holiday) and local villages, hopping on and off ferries. The hotel has an excellent chef and the breakfast buffet and dinner menu both had good choices of vietnamese and western food there was happy hour 4-6pm with 40 discount wine in restaurant was on pricey side even for vietnam. We treated ourselves to some good spa treatments and made good use of the two good sized swimming pools. Staff were very friendly and helpful and most spoke good english. Our room was a good size with large comfortable bed, and overlooked the gardens, pools and river.
カントーからタクシーでホテルへ説明の後 部屋に入ったけど 景色が裏庭リゾート感覚が 夜はホテルのナイトクルーズ(1人90万ドン)それが私たち2人のみ貸切状態 朝はモーニングクルーズへ朝のクルーズがおススメ 全体にどこにもあるリゾートホテル
環境優美

Anlage und service war hervorragend. Besonders angenehm ist die weitläufigkeit der anlage und die serviceangebote, was sowohl rückzugsmöglichkeiten als auch teilnahme an touristischen angeboten ermöglicht.

Ich würde das hotel wieder buchen, man kann keinen luxus erwarten, aber es war perfekt von der lage, es gibt einen kleinen pool auf dem dach und der preis ist einfach unschlagbar. Wir haben den rest des urlaubs nur in 5 sterne hotels verbracht und dies ist definitiv einfacher aber ich würde es wieder buchen.

Room was splendid - large, well appointed and with lovely river views. I did not try the breakfast due to an early morning boat tour. The service at the reception could have been much better, but by now i have resigned myself to being treated with barely disguised contempt and suspicion, however impeccably and generously i behave, while traveling solo in south east asia as a person of indian ethnicity. It is regrettable, but one can t hope to change deeply ingrained attitudes.

Zentral gelegen, junior-suite mit tollen ausblick aber wenig charme. Frühstück ok, service eher unbeholfen. Angenehmer aber eher kleiner dachpool. Kleines funktionsbereites businesscenter war hilfreich.

Good hotel right next to the river and street market and ideal spot to catch a boat to the floating market early in the morning. Luxury and standard of the hotel seems out of place with its immediate, surrounding location but this does not take away what it offers. Pool on the 8th floor has great view and well designed for the space available.
Fantastic location. Right in middle of true local markets great rooftop pool and view and lots of atmosphere

First up, the positives. This hotel is in a decent location close to the river and main ninh kien market area, and the main entrance opens on to a chaotic but fun street market selling all kinds of meat, fish, fruit and veg. The real highlight is the view from the 8th floor pool and terrace, down onto the river and for long distances all around - a great place to come for both sunrise and sunset. However, the pool itself is very shallow and difficult to swim in, and is also pretty chilly - the winds are quite strong up here. The outdoor part of the terrace is very small, with room for 5 sun loungers and not much else. You can also feel like you re in the zoo when hordes of other guests hang around the pool s edge taking photos and selfies, and in asia they stare at you without remorse. Breakfast was ok. Elevators are possibly the slowest in the known world. My real issue with the hotel was the noise. The corridors have no carpets and are thus extremely echoey, and fellow guests showed little regard for this as they shouted conversations with each other at all hours. On top of this, at one end (next to my room, 1008)) is an extraordinarily loud service elevator that operates from pre-dawn to late at night. To add to my woes, there was construction work going on above my room, meaning any hopes of a nap after a 4.30am start (to catch the floating markets in action) were dashed. Not really the relaxing place i had hoped it would be.

The west hotel can tho is exceptionally well situated ,very comfortable with lovely rooftop swimming pool. At the moment they are building a rooftop restaurant and bar which when finished will be really something. Our only minor criticism is that for us there is not enough choice for the western style breakfast when you compare it with the choice available for the vietnamese breakfast.
Great hotel excellent staff and servicerecomend

The main entrance of the hotel is wet market which is subjective to the traveler, some may like and some not. Not easy to find taxi, when back hotel, the taxi normally stop at the back door of hotel. There is swimming pool there but small. The bed is a bit hard, i personally prefer soft one.
시장에 위치하여 낮에 이동하기는 약간 불편합니다. 껀터 여행자 거리와 가깝고 도보 이동이 가능합니다. 단지 건축상의 문제로 샤워실 배수가 잘 안됩니다. 작년에도 건의했지만 고쳐지지 않습니다. 착한가격에 그냥 만족해야 합니다.
Convenient and safe, everything is good like a hotel in the state. I will come back next time
Great hotel, good value for the money!

We stayed for a night in this hotel. All the staff are very friendly. They helped us to rent motorbike, to find tourist guide, to reserve a return bus ticket, to call for taxi without extra charge. They can speak english very well. The hotel also located in front of the market and quay. You can easily catch a boat to cai rang floating market from here. We plan to extend another night here but it was fully booked.

Very nice hotel. They are trying hard to maintain four stars through extensive remodeling as the property is getting older. Staff was very nice. Breakfest had a large selection of western items. Rooms were quite clean and modern, although furniture was a bit dated. Bathroom was very nice. Pool area and stairs are a bit dangerous and slippery. My wife fell on the stairs due to being slick.

The hotel is surrounded by the biggest fish market in can tho. Depending on personal views this can be regarded as either a quaint or a busy/dirty location. It is only a 2-min walk from the hotel to the boat dock for tours to the floating market, so that s convenient. Because of the boat tour, we missed breakfast hours, but they provided us with a simple but tasty take away breakfast. The room was comfortable but does not seem to have been updated since the late 1980s and thus also carries an old-hotel-room smell that rather bothered my partner. The hotel staff were polite and helpful, but don t ask them to arrange an airport pick-up as they ll quote you 3-4 times more than a metered taxi will cost.
Great value in the heart of the night market. Room was clean and spacious. Good variety at breakfast buffet. Can hear traffic a bit on 5th floor. Pool was nice.

Man bliver lidt bange når man kommer til hotellet, fordi det er bagsiden man bliver kørt til. Der må ikke køre biler ved frontvejen. Men man bliver mødt af et venligt og hjælpsomt personale. Vi var tilfredse med at vi havde valgt dette hotel, fordi det har en unik beliggenhed i et typisk lokalområde, tæt på restauranter og flodpromonaden. De fleste hoteller ligger i områder hvor der intet liv er.
自転車を無料で借りれるのが良かったです

Hôtel correct en général, le gros est la piscine et la petite terrasse au 8e étage. En plus, localiser directement dans la rue du marché. Points faibles, la propreté de la chambre laissait un peu à désirer et pas d eau chaude 2 jours sur 3.

I had a great stay. I live about two hours away and it was easy to get to. Right by the central market and next to both western and vietnamese shops, eateries, etc. Walkable to other parts of the town, and the pool was refreshing. Great breakfast, great shower, and very friendly staff. We will stay again.

Great location right off the delta. Within walking distance to restaurants and markets in a tourist friendly area. Hotel staff was fabulous. We were able to book a personalized mekong delta tour through the front desk. They helped us with bus tickets for our return to ho chi minh city and were nice enough to write out a few phrases for us in vietnamese for our taxi driver. The hotel itself was lovely, luxurious and spacious. Would highly recommend!

Ottimo hotel buona posizione area ristoranti e shopping, pulito centrale e vicino ai traghetti. Staff professionale e cortese. Solo un problema con la housekeeper che ha ritirato l accappatoio dal letto dove lo lasciato e non l ho più rivisto. Ho informato la reception dell accaduto,ma nessuno sapeva dov era. Giustamente mi sono tutelato affinché non me lo addebitassero. Problem whit the housekeeper for one lost bathrobe, bad service!

Roof top terrace was under construction during stay. Beds were extremely squeaky and walls very thin. Could hear beds from other rooms squeaking as well. Breakfast was edible but not something that was very enjoyable. Chairs at breakfast area very uncomfortable. They would not let me bring coffee from breakfast up to my room to enjoy even though i brought my own cup. The breakfast area was not really a nice place to relax and drink coffee in the morning. Pool was nice, had a great view, and open late until 10pm. Hotel surrounded by fish smell though due to the fish street vendors surrounding. Hotel was clean, ac worked well, and water got hot quick.
Je descends au west depuis son ouverture. D énormes progrès ont été faits sur le nettoyage de la chambre. Petit-déjeuner quelconque. Environs calmes, bien que ce soit le marché.

Die dachterrasse mit pool ist zwar recht klein, der ausblick und die atmosphäre insbesondere bei dunkelheit sind fantastisch. Top frühstück ist sehr vielfältig und gut. Personal ist sehr freundlich. Einziges manko unser zimmer war recht altbacken eingerichtet und ein bischen muffig. Gute matratzen nur die tapete und möbel in die jahre gekommen.

I am a regular customer and have been staying here for the last 3 years. This year, the west hotel proves to be excellent as every year, in my opinion, the hotel room although small yet provides great functions such as central electrical panel next to bed where you can turn everything on/off after settling in bed. The best shower head ever (the rain forest style). Mirrors that allow you to do make up in the spacious bathroom and a full length mirror in the room allows dressing fitting before going out. Great. However, this year, i discovered one thing that really disturbing my bed sheet was never changed for the full length of my 8 night stay. I checked the 3 yellow stains on my sheet everyday and felt disappointed that i found it again the next day. Only on the 7th night that it was changed (and i hope that it was not intended for the next guest, as i was checking out the next morning). Please, the management checks this with your cleaning staff. This is the utmost important hygene standard that you should never compromised. Everything else of this hotel is lovely.

Good price, spacious rooms , very nice decorate, front staff friendly,good food compared to hotel price. There are a lot shopping malls and restaurant around, walking in short distance to ninh kieu park.
Good location, walking in a short distance to ninh kieu bay.there are many restaurants, shopping store around. Room is spacious and clean and good decorate . Front destroy helpful and nice
Fantastic hotel - very friendly service. I would recommend
Good i will come back next time. No 3
Het contrast is groot tussen de markt in fe buurt en dit luxe hotel, maar dat maakt het verblijf bijzonder

Personnel accueillant. Chambres spazieuses avec vue sur mekong, literie confortable, bonne isolation des chambres. Piscine agreable. Bemol petit dejeuner peu variee, salle austere. Au total, bon rapport qualite/prix
We need any assistant the staff is very helpful . I strongly recommend this hotel

The west hotel lobby is beautiful. Ornate furniture greets you when you enter. The rooms are large and clean with a great bathroom. However, our whole mekong delta experience was very disappointing as the floating markets are nothing near what photos indicate and the boats are all dull and uninspiring. If you go on a boat do not do the 6 hr trip. The canals of the delta are littered with refuse and all sorts of discarded rubbish. The propellor of the small boat is constantly stopping as has plastic or rope wrapped around it. When you leave the hotel you walk into another world as the local market is right outside the hotel. Nigh life is very quiet in can tho but they have a great street market where you can purchase lots of local foods. Lastly, breakfast at this hotel is plentiful but there is no atmosphere and supposedly hot food is only luke warm and sits there from 6am to 10 am so beware. Finally, if you are a light sleeper this hotel is not for you as it is fully tiled so you hear every footstep, door banging people talking and the elevator pinging all night. Pool is shade all day so is refreshing after a day out.

Phuong trang bus service pick us up from hotel and drove us to saigon for 100,000 vn dong, this hotel seating right in middle of busy market, if you don t want smell all fish and other products use the back door, but this is how close to the vietnam culture you can get, we enjoy it. In the evening we just walk out in less than 5 minutes, we boarded a du thuyen can tho at ben ninh kieu, excellent food for dinner cruise, we come back second day, remember come about 5pm to reserve top level of the boat, the boat running at 6 30pm,
Das hotel liegt direkt am fluss wo auch der markt ist. Man kann alles bequem zu fuß erreichen.

I booked this hotel base on the photo s on hotels.com and their description of close to the river etc. But the hotel itself is super hard to find as it is in the centre of a local market which does not allow any vehicle traffic from 6am to 6pm. After 6pm, there are lots of transport trucks unloading produces etc for the market, so again it is very hard to get in and out. The main entrance of this hotel is actually the market itself! the only other way to get in is to park on the next street..then through a corridor (which used to be a house but the hotel bought it and made it a corridor) and then past a small alley way and into the underground parking and then to the lobby. Since it is located in the centre of local residence, i can smell cooking of fish sauce etc coming into the room. It is also not close to the ninh kieu river/parkway either. The only good thing about this hotel are it is very new, good breakfast and price. When i booked it, the pictures of the hotel on hotels.com didn t even show the market at all (probably photoshopped out) but it showed a clear area and then the river. Well in reality, maybe it will be this way if you bulldoze the market and all the houses around that area. I feel this is very misleading... If i know better, i would stay at the international hotel which is down the block with a clear riverview/parkway.
Everything was pretty good over all except that hotel was right by the street market so it was little noisy and smelly.
リバービューの眺望のある部屋を予約したのに 残念ながらリバービューがない部屋もあった
Pleasantly surprised by this hotel. Left too early so couldn t get the breakfast. Room was noisy due to people banging their doors and coming and going all night. Staff fantastic.

This is a great hotel if you want to explore the local market and it is close to the riverside park. Staff were friendly. The first room they assigned to me was near a local karaoke bar and even in the mid afternoon, it was too loud. I asked for a new room and the hotel staff immediately moved me. The room was comfortable and clean. The shower was excellent. Bed was very comfortable. I did hear the market start up around 4 15am, but it was not enough noise to wake me. I think this hotel is a great one for the price. Oh, by the way, breakfast was excellent.

Leider etwas stickig und müffelig sowie relativ geringe englischkenntnisse. Wir hatten auch einige probleme mit dem wlan. Auf sauberkeit könnte in der hotelklasse mehr geachtet werden. Schade denn das personal war freundlich und hilfsbereit. Dafür war es in einem oberen stockwerk noch relativ ruhig und gut ausgestattet sowie geräumig. Auch am halb überdachten pool ließ es sich gut aushalten und vor allem die aussicht genießen.

Don t be put off by being taken to back entrance of the hotel you will understand when you walk out of front entrance. Hotel is in centre of local food market which is bustling. ( no smells from market) close to the river and night market . Rooms in the hotel are large and certainly the bathroom i had was enormous. Breakfast provided was good, plenty of choice. Vietnamese food and western, freshly cooked eggs although the hash browns and bacon were cold the morning i tried them . Vietnamese and nescafe coffee was on offer it was good to have the pool but my only criticism of the hotel, was that the pool was not cleaned whilst i was there and the steps in,i felt could have been safer . Altogether though it was a good value comfortable hotel that i would recommend
フロントの対応もよく くつろぐことができました

Excellent hotel, we were only there one night, but almost wish we stayed longer, but we had other places to visit. Can tho in general was much nicer than i was expecting and i was amazed at the lack of traffic. Do not be put off by the market outside hotel staff very helpful with onward transportation, making sure that we were picked up from the hotel and we were told to phone if we had any problems getting to our next hotel. We were also given a taxi number to phone once the bus had dropped us off as the drop off was not a bus station.
A good stay, convenient location, helpful english-speaking staff. Great pool and bikes available. Plenty of choice at breakfast.

Hotel lezi kousek od centra can to. V blizkosti je trziste, moznost vyletu na plovouci trhy. Nocni trhy tez v blizkosti. Snidane na hotelu dobra, pokoje jsou ciste a prostorne. Servis je na dobre urovni. Voda v bazenu neni uplne tepla. Celkove velice prijemny pobyt.
Prisvärt och trevligt hotell med professionell personal. Gångavstånd till allt längs flodstranden.

Really nice hotel. Building and room is new facing a gorgeous view of the mekong river. Access to the hotel is limited to street from the rear of the hotel due to the market activities in front. Hotel didn t mention this so our driver got lost for a moment. But still, we enjoyed the stay.
Service was excellent, we can highly recommend the hotel.

Tutto sommato l albergo corrisponde alla descrizione, unica pecca è la terribile location che ti costringe ad attraversare il mercato con quello che ne consegue(puzza di pesce, sporco e mal frequentato )
Picture looks better that reality corridor are dark , basic rooms market is on the street so very busy in the morning

Good view from upper floors of hotel towards the river - including from the pool on floor 8.close to docking area for small tour boats for trips to floating markets. Breakfast buffet ok. Good quality in relation to price.

Personnel extrêmement accueillant et à l écoute, qui peut résoudre tous les problèmes (réservations de bus , voitures...) avec le sourire. Chambre e grand luxe ( baignoire et douche) petit déjeuner extrêmement riche et varié même si l on n a pas envie de goûter a des nems et des. Crevettes des 8h le matin... Vue sur le mekong de la piscine incroyable . Équipements de l hôtel parfait proche et de l embarcadère et du marché. Hotel de grande classe, parfait !

Hotel correct , propre, accueil sympathique mais chambre si petite que l on n arrive pas a ouvrir sa valise. Pas de bouilloire dans la chambre, équipement minimaliste. Mais proximité intéressante de la place d italie

I booked this hotel for 2 nights and i was not disappointed. Great hotel, beautiful room, modern and comfortable. Really clean. A swimming pool, small but the goal is to have pleasure and nothing else. A room like this in a western country would be the double at least. People at the reception were great as well, they speak english and are able to help you.
Stayed for 3 nights to take a good look around can tho. Perfect location with friendly, english speaking staff. Hotel is immaculate, breakfast was great.

Hôtel bien situé. Vélos gratuits, profitez en ça permet de sortir du centre immédiat et il y a un petit lac avec une belle ambiance à voir. L hôtel a un grand besoin de rénovation! les chambres, les couloirs. La salle de bain était très bien mais les draps du lit... Déchirés! je recommande quand même! le personnel est très aidant et la piscine bien appréciée en fin de journée.
Nous avons visité can tho en janvier l hôtel s est avéré un très bon choix. La localisation en fait le meilleur choix. Les chambres sont un peu défraîchies. Déjeuner style buffet très complet.

Das hotel ist zwar schon etwas in die jahre gekommen, aber die zimmer sind sauber und gepflegt. Im superior-zimmer hatte ich einen tollen blick auf den mekong. Das frühstücksbuffet bietet eine große auswahl an speisen.
Generally ok for a short stay
Price on hotels.com is trible another app. They changed booking id. Breakfast is bad. Room is old and very small. Welcome to prison.
Dirty old hotel. Cockroaches on the floor, no light in common area. Good central location but in the middle of the fish market
Good location close to the market and pier. Rooms need an update. Night staff were a sleep when we came for breakfast. Ok for the price.

Overall the room was spacious and bedding was very comfortable, spacious bathroom, nice bath tub and the hairdryer worked very well. Great breakfast and there are free bicycles for hotel guests to use. The lobby decor might seem outdated but the rooms were refurbished, clean and comfy. We were served a welcome drink when we arrived and they let us check in early. Location is very near to the night market and the quay that is the starting point of the floating market excursion. The road to the hotel is a bit hard to manoeuvre as the local market (sells raw meats veggies) is just below. Our taxi from the airport didn t know how to get here and dropped us 200m from the hotel because the road in front of the main entrance is closed daily from 6am to 6pm. There is actually a back entrance where cars can pass thru.

Det var et fejlvalg fra min side. Jeg kunne ikke lide hotellet, og placering midt i en markedsgade som betød en masse støj. Værelset var kedeligt og trist, restaurant decideret dårlig. Ikke er hotel jeg vil anbefale til nogen.
Prima verblijf niets bijzonders
개미가 많고 청소도 요청하지않으면 안해줍니다. 수건도 요청이없으면 갈아주지 않습니다. 세탁서비스를 맡겼는데 얼룩이 졌지만 옷값이 너무 비싸다는 이유로 물어주지 않으려 했습니다. 싸긴하지만 한번 더 고민해보세요.
Bra och nytt hotell, fantastisk utsikt från taket. Nära nattmarknad och annat trevligt.
Perfect location staff pool room..............l...l.l.

L hotel est bien situé, près des embarcations pour les marchés flottants, de la promenade près de l eau, des restaurants, du marché de nuit et en plein coeur d une rue marché public. Le meilleur des hôtels que nous avons eu en 21 nuits au vietnam. L hotel mérite un 4 étoiles plutôt qu un 3 et une note d au moins 9.

Ne mérite vraiment pas ses 4 étoiles grand maximum 3 et encore. Chambre dans un état délabré, draps et oreillers tachés, cheveux dans la chambre et la salle de bain, linges ne sentaient pas le propre. Déjeuner très pauvre en choix. Heureusement que le personnel de la réception était à la hauteur. Bon pour les routards et encore.

Dirty bathroom. Shower didnot close water everywhere. Breakfast was lame. Ac did not cool. When complained, was told we ll make it better next time. Upon check out, not checkin, charged extra 100,000 dong for my wife.
Bad location close to the night market and that s the only good thing
Rất tốt

Für den preis in ordnung, mehr aber auch nicht. Lage ist gut für bootstouren zum floating market. Personal war bei unserer ankunft extrem freundlich und uns wurde sofort mit unseren gepäck geholfen. Beim auschecken wurde man leider nichtmehr so freundlich unterstützt und man hatte das gefühl, das personal will einen möglichst schnell los werden. Außerdem war das hotel nichtmal ansatzweise ausgebucht und trotzdem durften wir unser zimmer nicht 2 stunden länge behalten und sollten 50 des zimmerpreises dafür bezahlen! wirklich schlechter sevice! frühstück können wir leider nicht beurteilen, da wir in der zeit auf dem floating market waren.

Staff were very helpful, especially the front desk. However we stayed in a room on the fourth floor, i won t say which one specifically, and i noticed when we checked in the window ledge was very grubby, i didn t want to complain at the time as it seemed minor but when it rained it resulted in small dead flies being blown across the room. I wish i d taken pictures to upload here but when it was at it s worst i did not want the pictures on my phone reminding me. The pool also looked as though it needed a clean, everything else however was in decent condition. I ve had better breakfasts though. Unfortunately although the hotel itself is relatively nice it s on a market street which, as with most vietnamese markets, smells of fish and sour fruit. Although this is not the hotels fault, just something to consider.

West hotel is an amazing place to stay. It is in a beautiful part of town, where you can walk out and immediately see a culturally rich street full of freshly caught fish, many types of fruits, not many tourists, and friendly people. The service was amazing as well. We wanted to go to the floating markets, but wanted to take a private boat (instead of a touristy boat), just me and my boyfriend (and the boat driver). West hotel was able to accommodate this request with flying colors. Not only were they able to get us a friendly boat driver who would take us out at 4 30am until 11 30am, but they had a delicious breakfast ready for us at this time as well. We went to the floating markets, a fruit garden, a noodle factory, and more. It was absolutely wonderful. The only concern we had while staying at this hotel was nothing to do with west hotel, but a problem that has been occurring with hotels.com throughout our two weeks in vietnam. For every hotel that we ve gone to, there s been some sort of issue where the hotel is unable to see our hotels.com booking because it is not going through from hotels.com. Luckily, we just show them our booking confirmation once we get there and after waiting about 10 min or so, we are accommodated by the hotel....but hotels.com really needs to fix this. If the hotels are all booked, they might not have been able to accomodate us. I recommend calling hotels booked through hotels.com in advance to make sure they are aware of your reservation.
Bien situé près des marchés, personnel serviable, chambre fonctionnelle et propre, gros choix d aliments au petit-déjeuner, bonne connexion internet, petite épicerie juste à côté de l hôtel.
Very friendly and helpful staffs, willing to assist with all your needs
Good customer services. The rooms are clean the foods are good with good customer services
Excellent staff service, very friendly, room is very clean.
Location for hotel was perfect! pool on 8th floor was super aswell
Breakfast was weak. Pool area is with 6 seats

De reparatie aan de fiets van het hotel waar onderweg een trapper afbrak, werd keurig vergoed. Was bijna mijn overhemd en trui vergeten werd netjes gemeld bij het uitchecken en bij de receptie gebracht.
Hotel condition was very poor and customers service was poor as well. I would not stay here again. This hotel is not even a 3 stars rating in my view. So run down

Ein sehr ordenliches 4 hotel. Es war rundum alles ok. Nur die gegend ist etwas gewöhnungsbedürftig. Bei unserem 4 tägigen aufenthalt, waren ab ca. 17 uhr alle straßen um das hotel mehr oder weniger vom ansteigenden mekong überflutet.
フロントスタッフともに問題なし 周辺の独特の雑踏は好き嫌いがあろうけれど小生は東南アジア独得の猥雑が好きなので問題は全くありません
The staff was really helpful! they book a tour for us and they guve us great tips! you can have bikes for free ) and the pool has and amazing view!! i love this place!

A solid 3 star hotel which could regain 4 star with some updates. The rooftop pool overlooking the city is nice and the location right in the local market is fantastic. Five minute walk to get to the center of town. It s former luxury can be seen but it s tired. The staff is nice but there is limited english. The breakfast is ok and the wi-fi is a little slow. It s a great value.

The hotel was nice overall but i especially liked the staff of the hotel. Staff at the reception was so nice, smart, friendly and helpful. They helped us solve all our problems and responded to all our requests including recommending restauants which opens till late, booking a boat tour at reasonable price, booking bus tickets back to hcmc and even packing our breakfast for us to take away early in the morni g when we did the boat tour.

Hôtel correspondant à un 3 étoiles français, propre, confortable avec un petit déjeuner copieux. Très correcte pour le prix. Les plus l accueil, la gentillesse et les services rendus. On nous a même parlé français. Bien placé
Mooi hotel met grote kamers. Zit je hoog dan heb je uitzicht over de rivier. Met dakterras en zwembad op de 8ste etage. Een heel fijn verblijf gehad.

J ai séjourné14 jours dans cet hôtel de can tho. Je n étais pas contente de ma chambre à mon arrivée. On me l a changée le lendemain. Ma chambre single est de bonne dimension. L hôtel est récent et tout fonctionne. L hôtel est situé à proximité des départs pour les marchés flottants. L entrée principale se trouve en plein marché, très actif de jour. La piscine est très petite. Pas vraiment de salon cosy où prendre un verre
The hotel is right at the market, but despite it being busy the whole day, my room was quiet. Walking distance to the pier, many restaurants. Great, helpful staff, good breakfast, good wi-fi.
Très belle hôtel les gens sont hyper serviable bien situé dans le cœur du marché rural pres de tout n hésitez pas!
Hotel decor was garish and although the bed was clean, the room itself hadn t been cleaned properly - i had to wipe the surfaces down myself when i checked it.
It was very good. I can advise the hotel
여러번방문해으나매번똑같은음식.조식형편없음.

Hotel is abandoned and in need of attention to its condition. My room was in terrible condition and needs lots of cosmetic work. I have included pictures. However the breakfast was excellent. Covenient location but the market in front smells horrible and is very loud.

hotelName: Wink Hotel Can Tho - 24hrs stay & Rooftop Pool Bar
userCmt: Mọi thứ đều tốt, trừ nhân viên chưa chuyên nghiệp. Check in chờ rất lâu. Khi tôi đến check-in thì nhân viên đứng nhìn tôi và cắm đầu vào điện thoại. Tôi phải lặp lại nhiều lần rằng tôi check-in thì cô nhân viên bước chân uể oải mệt mỏi đến bàn check-in và nói rằng nhân viên phụ trách check-in đang dẫn khách đi xem phòng. Tôi chờ khá lâu, nhân viên đó vẫn đứng yên ở bàn check-in bấm điện thoại và tán gẫu cùng 2 nam nhân viên khác. Chủ khách sạn có thể yêu cầu nhân viên hãy tập trung vào khách hàng thay vì bấm điện thoại suốt và hạn chế tán gẫu ko? sau khi cô nhân viên phụ trách check-in xuống thì cô ấy lại cầm điện thoại riêng và lại bấm điện thoại rồi nghe điện thoại rất lâu. Có vẻ như tôi và các khách khác đều vô hình. Buổi tối và trưa hôm sau tôi dùng thức ăn ở đây, nhân viên phục vụ khá lâu, và bê xong thức ăn cho khách thì lại đứng tán gẫu, cười đùa, ko một ai chú ý đến khách, tôi phải đến bảo rằng tôi cần gì thì họ lật đật đi tìm. Thức ăn ở đây chưa ngon lắm theo khẩu vị của tôi, đặc biệt là các món có nước sốt thì nước sốt chưa được ngon. Bữa ăn sáng thì nhân viên cũng chưa chuyên nghiệp lắm khi đứng chiên trứng khá vất vả, muỗng và thức ăn gì hết thì tôi và khách phải bảo nhân viên bổ sung thêm, còn bản thân nhân viên thì không làm điều này khi không có ai yêu cầu.

userCmt: Khách sạn nhìn thì đẹp mà phòng bé tí tẹo , nàm 1 giường không đủ luôn , chật kín , phòng bước vô thấy ngộp , rồi mình đặt 2 phòng trước ngày đi , mà khi đến nói lễ tân chỉ cho có 1 phòng bắt dồn vô 1 phòng , chờ mãi cũng không có phòng , mình điện thoại liên tục , thấy mình bực lên , mới đưa phòng cho mình mà đưa mình thêm 1 lầu. Nữa , trong khi đi 4 người , thẻ thì tầng nào mới đi được tầng đó , muốn ghe phòng người kia lấy đồ cũng không được , muốn gặp phải xuống lễ tân mới gặp được , thật sự trảu nghiệm 1 đêm , so với tiền bỏ ra , không đáng tí nào ??? ai có đi khách sạn này nên suy nghũ kĩ lại ???????

Free stuff in the fridge like soya bean milk and yogurt

We arrived on phuong trang sleeper bus from ben xe mien tay (hcmc). Price was 165k per person including transfer to winterspring. We enjoyed our stay in the autumn room. Large room with small balcony. Everything was clean. 2 water bottles a day. Cleaning on request . Had shampoo body wash bottles. Toothbrush and toothpaste packets. Comb. Hairdryer, fridge, tv (which we didn t use). Be careful not to close the bathroom door as there s a lock from the inside. We did it accidentally and couldn t open the bathroom door from the outside . Bath mat (not all vietnamese hotels provide this). The aircon takes a while to cool as it s a large room. There s a desk, chair and hammock. There s a kitchen on level 4 and free front loader washing machine. Need to supply your own laundry powder. They can help with motorbike rental for 140k manual and 160k automatic but unfortunately the company they used didn t have any left. See my review on can tho motorbike rental that i found on google. We parked our motorbike in front during the day and staff brought inside the kitchen at night for safe keeping. Key to unlock the doors is on top of the fridge. Sister trang answered any questions we had. She even offered to call and book phuong trang sleeper bus to our next destination my tho. I ended up calling myself to book tickets and the transfer car picked us up from hotel to the can tho bus station. 155k per person. Including transfer car to hotel in my tho.
Très bon rapport qualité/prix, la chambre est bien équipée avec fenetre et balcon. La responsable a pu nous louer des scooter, elle nous a beaucoup aidé durant notre séjour.
Ja
Had some trouble getting into the building but had a what s up number for contact. Suite had everything we needed on the third floor plus kitchen on the fourth with clothes washer.

This place is great, esoectfir a solo traveler. Not only is it extremely affordable, the room is large, has a refrigerator and flat screeded tv and is tastefully decorated. It is in close proximity to local attractions and restaurants.

In spite of not receiving booking notice from expedia, winter spring still check us in without hassle all the while handling the situations very politely by front desk staff, john. Most generous breakfast, pantry and free flow drinks in all my home stays . Imagine...you can help yourself to the delicious home made yogurt from the fridge, anytime. Thanks lang and sophia, we both enjoyed our stay.

We could keep motorcycle inside safely every time using password lock system. And our room was clean and i felt all furniture was selected carefully by owner. The room was very comfortable. Especially breakfast was really good with fresh materials. I really recommend this homestay in can tho. I m sure winter and spring homestay is one of best choice.

This was a wonderful place to stay! the room was spacious so it took a little while for the air con too cool off the large room but it was worth it. We had great breakfast prepared by friendly staff. We used the bicycles for free and rented a motorbike one day. We really enjoyed our experience there!
Nice garden. Furniture needs to be upgraded. No sign at the front property. Should have breakfast included. More flowers in the garden.

The room i booked was occupied so they gave me a different one. They were very friendly and even provided me with a book of what to do, eat and see in can tho which was great! there s free bicycles and for a small fee you can rent a motorbike. The free breakfast was delicious and fresh, and the tour i booked through them was amazing and very easy to book. They were all such lovely people.

Hotel divisé en deux bâtiments, un peut éloigner du port. A part cela tout est parfait, grande chambre très propre, grande, bien équipé. Accueil chaleureux. Des fruits et yaourt disponible à tout moment, bon petit déjeuné, vélo et scooter en près gratuit ... On nous a même ramené à l aéroport dans un confortable 4x4 gratuitement.
Sophia and her husband are great hosts withh all the good recommendations and tips, they helped us book a tour on the mekong delta and we also had dinner with them she is a fantastic cook!

Personnel très sympathique et très accueillant. Possibilité de réservation d activités. Chambre très propre, situation de l établissement dans un quartier calme. Kitchenette à disposition, petite terrasse aérée très agréable. Établissement à recommander

Ett fantastiskt ställe med fantastiska ägare och personal. Du kan inte bo bättre eller trevligare i can tho. Jag rekommenderar winter spring homestay varmt. Inte nog med att dom kör dig från och till flygplatsen eller busstationen. Dom hjälper dig att boka eller köpa alla biljetter du behöver hjälp med. Du kan låna cykel eller moped. Dom har lagt ner omsorg på att ge dig råd om bästa restaurangerna etc. Det är mycket rent och det märks att man lagt ner stor omsorg på att boendet skall vara trevligt och avslappnat. Har de inte möjlighet att hjälpa dig ber de någon annan att göra det. Du kan inte bo bättre i can tho.

The room is very spacious and has well choosen furniture. Almost everything is out of wood, so it feels like home. The bed is really big and the matrace is really comfortable. The owners are very accommodating, i mean you can use bicycles, a motorbike, the laundry machine, the kitchen and you don t need to pay extra money. As if that s not enough, there is some food in the fridge you can use for free, as well as free water for coffee and tea. Awesome! the breakfast is also good, the owners will respect your eating behaviours, for example if you re vegetarian. They are also a big help if you are planning some tours or need help for booking a bus. You are definitely not finding a place like this in can tho, which is that cheap and offers so much to you. Would definitely recommend!
Nice home stay with good breakfast! a very helpful and friendly owner. We really liked the tours you can book with them. Thank you!

Sophia and lang are great. The breakfasts are amazing (included) and you can join them for dinner for 3.00. They will help you with any arrangements you need including bus tickets and taking you to the bus station. They have bicycles and a scooter that you can use free of charge and a washing machine. Just a great place to stay. About a 20 minute walk to the centre but lots of restaurants and markets right around the hotel.
